name: Wells Fargo Mobile
description:
The eInspect app was designed by Wells Fargo for business customers to streamline the equipment inspection process for Hyster & Yale lift trucks.

This easy-to-use mobile version enables:
• A standardized & comprehensive reporting process
• The efficient collection of condition details and high-resolution photographs
• Saving time and money with end-of-lease lift truck inspections

The eInspect app is fully integrated with HYGFS Asset Tracker for the quick download and upload of equipment data.

Simply use your existing Asset Tracker login credentials and accept the app Terms & Conditions.

This application requires the use of IOS version 9 or greater.

For comments or questions on the application please contact us at: Support@e-inspect.info
